    Netty ByteBuf implementation of ImmediateByteBody.

    This is a netty-specific reactor-like API for streaming bytes.
    BufferConsumer.Upstream
    This interface manages the backpressure for data consumptions.
    FileBodyWriter
    Body writer for Files.
    InputStreamBodyWriter
    Body writer for InputStreams.

    Adapter from generic streaming ByteBody to StreamingNettyByteBody.

    Common base class for streaming and immediate netty ByteBody implementations.

    Body writer for StreamedFiles.
    StreamingNettyByteBody
    Netty implementation for streaming ByteBody.
    StreamingNettyByteBody.SharedBuffer
    This class buffers input data and distributes it to multiple StreamingNettyByteBody instances.
    SystemFileBodyWriter
    Body writer for SystemFiles.
